title: Visakhapatnam  to host International conference of LED makers
content:
Visakhapatnam to host International conference of LED makers Comments

September 7, 2015 - Hyderabad

VIJAYAWADA

The Union Government has decided to conduct an international conference with world leaders in energy efficiency measures in LED lighting in Visakhapatnam.

The event will be held in November in recognition of the State’s impressive track record in Energy Efficiency and Energy Conservation activities. The event hosted by Bureau of Energy Efficiency of Ministry of Power is to showcase the best practices of Government of Andhra Pradesh in energy conservation to other States said the BEE Director General Ajay Mathur to AP Energy Secretary Ajay Jain. He also agreed to provide additional financial assistance to activities of State Energy Conservation Mission. 

Ajay Jain during a meeting with the BEE Director General said that the State has appointed third party agencies for studying the impact of Domestic Efficient Lighting Programme (DELP) Stage-I under which 57 lakh LED bulbs were distributed in four districts. He BEE DG informed Ajay Jain that necessary clearances would be given in 21 days and other steps taken for speedy execution of the projects. Andhra News Comment on this story
